uk.ac.sanger.cgp.autocsa.analysis

Class Adjustment

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.sanger.cgp.autocsa.analysis.Adjustment

  • public class Adjustment
extends java.lang.Object

    Mobility property/base spacing class for AutoCSA package.

    Only valid for ABI 3730 POP7 trace files.

    Default adjustment for pre mobility corrected trace files.

    Original author: emd
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    $Author$

        Parameters:
